title: Rod Wave - Richer ft. Polo G (Official Audio)

"Richer" Lyrics

N***as ain’t getting no money tell em quit that capping
N***as ain’t getting no money tell em quit that capping
In this bitch relaxing you ain’t even did your taxes
We went triple platinum, I don’t wanna hear no nagging
Made it happen
Youngin’ out that bottom but he made it happen
I don’t wanna make no friends thumbing through my ends
Who he think he is in that brand new Benz?
They should’ve knew I was coming
Just a little youngin I knew how to get me some money
Know I turn nothing to something,
Now look at your cousin, the youngest millionaire running
I promise to keep it 100, keep it 100
You see me grinding and hustling
Oh you guys disrespect me fuck you give me my check please

(Rod Wave - chorus)
Younging chasing dreams reaching for the stars
Be all you can be, eat or you gon starve
The youngin out that bottom but he beat the odds
Yeah (4x)
But now I’m richer than I’ve ever been,
I’m richer than I’ve ever been
I’m richer than I’ve ever been
I’m richer than I’ve ever been
He richer than he ever been

(Polo G - verse)
Richer than ever
Whipping a Tesla,
Cars, hoes, etcetera
Hit em with pressure
My n***as won’t let up
Tell em n***as to catch up
Wake up got a million in diamonds that sit on the dresser
Run up that check now I’m flexing my muscles I feel like a wrestler
Cause we come from nothing to Rollies and plaques
Fake love it was holding him back
Flashbacks while you pouring the yak
Since a young n***a he just wanted the sack
Used to daydream about thumbing through racks 
Heat tucked it get cold in the Raq
Tears fall while he loading the strap
Seen it all he just wanna relax

I’m richer than I ever been,
Put my heart before the bag worst shit I ever did
Gave you a second chance and you left again
Remember days I used to wonder would we ever win

(Rod Wave - chorus)
Younging chasing dreams reaching for the stars
Be all you can be, eat or you gon starve
The youngin out that bottom but he beat the odds
Yeah (4x)
But now I’m richer than I’ve ever been,
I’m richer than I’ve ever been
I’m richer than I’ve ever been
I’m richer than I’ve ever been
He richer than he ever been
